info.name: Prbal API for User Management - Enhanced
info.description: Complete API collection for Prbal user management with 36 endpoints enhanced with Universal Document/Image Conversion. All responses follow standardized format: {message, data, time, statusCode}. Now supports URLs, base64, local files, and cloud storage for documents/images across all endpoints. Includes Authentication (11), User Profile Management (6), Token Management (4), Social Features (2), User Search (3), and Verification (10) endpoints.

item.name: Universal Document/Image Conversion Testing
item.description: Test endpoints for the enhanced universal document/image conversion capabilities. Tests various input methods: URLs, base64, file uploads, and cloud storage references.

response.name: Mixed Methods Success
Profile Update with Image URL Success
response.body:
{
  "message": "Profile updated successfully with image conversion",
  "data": {
    "id": "uuid-here",
    "username": "testuser",
    "first_name": "Enhanced",
    "last_name": "User",
    "bio": "Testing universal image conversion",
    "profile_picture": "https://example.com/profile_pictures/converted_image.jpg",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-01T12:30:00Z",
    "image_processing": {
      "source_url": "https://example.com/sample-image.jpg",
      "conversion_method": "url_download",
      "optimization_applied": true,
      "final_size": 95232,
      "processing_time_ms": 1100
    }
  },
  "time": "2024-01-01T12:30:00Z",
  "statusCode": 200
}
